short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vids Tab - a must-have extension for video lovers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vids Tab  - By 50m media LTD. We are 100% Free! 

Vids Tab extension presents the most popular Video websites. With Vids Tab you can easily choose the best sources of videos on the net. 
The search results used within the extension will be provided by popular search engines; however, the extension will not make any changes in your default browser search setting.
By installing the Vids Tab Chrome extension you agree to install this application, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy. 
End User License Agreement - https://www.media-tab.com/trms
Privacy Policy - https://www.media-tab.com/pp
How to remove this extension from your Chrome?
You can open your Chrome browser’s Settings and find our extension in the Extensions page. Click on the “Remove” button and it will be completely removed. Alternatively, you can right-click on the extension’s icon on your browser, select “Remove from Chrome” from the drop-down menu.
